Package ca.gc.cra.radar.api

package ca.gc.cra.radar.api
Command-line entry points for RADAR capture, live, assemble, and poster workflows.

CLI classes convert flat key-value arguments into Config aggregates and delegate to application use cases.

Depends on ca.gc.cra.radar.config and ca.gc.cra.radar.application. Does not depend on infrastructure adapters directly.

Since:
RADAR 0.1-doc
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    ca.gc.cra.radar.api.tools
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AssembleCli
    Entry point for running the assemble pipeline over captured segments.
    CaptureCli
    Entry point for packet capture using the RADAR port-based pipeline.
    CliArgsParser
    Utility for turning key=value CLI arguments into a lookup map.
    LiveCli
    Launches the live RADAR capture pipeline from CLI key-value arguments.
    Main
    RADAR CLI dispatcher that routes to subcommands.
    PosterCli
    Entry point for rendering reconstructed protocol traffic into poster outputs.
